title: Phylogenetic Comparative Methods in R - Solutions
text:
This book contains solutions to the exercises in the book Phylogenetic Comparative Methods in R (Revell and Harmon 2022).


To run the code in this book, you will need to install R (>=4.2.0) and the following packages:

# Install BiocManager
install.packages("BiocManager")

# Use BiocManager to install required packages
packages <- c(
    "ape",
    "phytools",
    "treeio", 
    "ggtree", 
    "here", 
    "phangorn"
)

BiocManager::install(packages)

After that, you should have everything ready.




Revell, Liam J, and Luke J Harmon. 2022. Phylogenetic Comparative Methods in r. Princeton University Press.
